description: The Department of National Defence requires 30 safety relief valves to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
======================================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-6480-83372261
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-04T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-06-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-06-30
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Product Details

* **Item 1**: Valve, Safety Relief (NSN: 01-1518950, GSIN: 4820)
	+ Part Number: YB2385E224, NCAGE: 35795 (Leslie Controls, Inc.)
	+ Quantity: 15, Unit of Issue: Each (EA), delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Item 2**: Valve, Safety Relief (NSN: 01-1518950, GSIN: 4820)
	+ Part Number: YB2385E224, NCAGE: 35795 (Leslie Controls, Inc.)
	+ Quantity: 15, Unit of Issue: Each (EA), delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Application Information

* **Contact Person**: Katharine Barker, [katharine.barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:katharine.barker2@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Phone: 134359-86913
	+ Country: Canada
	+ Province: None

### Additional Information

* **Notice**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Region of Delivery**: British Columbia, Nova Scotia, and Canada

### Tender Documents

* **English**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6480/rfp-w8482-241783-eng.pdf
* **French**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6480/rfp-w8482-241783-fre.pdf

Note: [trademark] was necessary to escape the asterisk symbol (*), as it is
